info.name: Cade's Meditech Carbon-Green
info.description: A dark skin for Meditech jira users. To use, add "jira.meditech.com" in the "URL" section.
info.additionalInfo:
0.1: Added whiter whites, and made text pop.
0.2: Edited the search screen.
0.3: Added default URL to the skin so users don't have to define it (hopefully). Edited some minor text elements, cleaned up some dividers.
